short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip YouTube Ads and hide banner automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip YouTube Ads and hide banner automatically when you watching YouTube playlist. Please note this is not an ad blocker, just help you clicking "Skip Ads" button when YouTube offer the choice.
